#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<string>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<utility>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
#define mod 1000000007
static int tree[1000005];
void update(int a)
{
    int i=a;
    while(i<=1000005)
    {
        tree[i]++;
        i=i+(i&(-i));
    }
}
int query(int a)
{
    int i=a;
    int s=0;
    while(i>0)
    {
        s=s+tree[i];
        i=i-(i&(-i));
    }
    return s;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            int a;
            scanf("%d",&a);
            printf("%d ",query(a-1));
            update(a);
        }
        cout<<endl;
        memset(tree,0,sizeof(tree));
    }
    return 0;
}
